meanings.definition: A young person who is eligible to vote.
meanings.sent1: The voteen was excited to participate in the election.
meanings.sent2: The voteen registered to vote as soon as they turned 18.
meanings.sent3: The voteen brought their friends to the voting booth for the first time.
meanings.sent4: Being a voteen is like having a key to democracy.
meanings.sent5: The voteen proudly wore their 'I Voted' sticker.

meanings.definition: To cast a vote in an election.
meanings.sent1: I will voteen for my favorite candidate in the upcoming election.
meanings.sent2: She decided to voteen early to avoid the crowds on election day.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to voteen for the best treat in the bowl.
meanings.sent4: His decision to voteen for change made a difference in the community.
meanings.sent5: The students will voteen for their class president tomorrow.

meanings.definition: The act of voting in an election.
meanings.sent1: Participating in the voteen is a civic duty.
meanings.sent2: The turnout for the voteen was higher than expected.
meanings.sent3: The voteen lasted late into the night due to a tie in the results.
meanings.sent4: The power of the voteen can shape the future of a nation.
meanings.sent5: She felt a sense of pride after the voteen was over.
